channel.title: How do I play?
channel.description:
Hi, sorry I am new and cannot work out how to play a server,
Can someone please help thanks?
I am using the Moparscape v4.0 Webclient and typing the Ip and Port and it says "error connection to server"? thanks everyone

item.title: How do I play?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Log in with the IP 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I play?
item.dc:creator: @Pixel_Cookies Pixel_Cookies
item.description:
@Pixel_Cookies wrote:

Try to read the server requirements carefully, there are very few servers now that only run on the moparscape client.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I play?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Sigh…It’s just not that hard…
Okay do me a favor. Go to the top of this page. Click ‘Home’. Click Server Downloads. Get rid of moparscape. Download a client and server and play. Or go to moparscape server status :0 Its amazing!

Read full topic
